title: sublime Text3 之 markdown
text: 摘要：sublime Text3安装markdown插件并修改主题等 1.sublime Text3安装等 安装包，注册码，安装插件出错等 解决sublimeText3无法安装插件问题 – There are no packages available for installation 2.sublime Text3安装markdown插件等 Sublime Text3下的markdown插件的安装及配置 Sublime Text 3 使用MarkDown编写带预览的文本 3.sublime Text3中md主题修改等 主题配置文件 12345678910111213{ //"color_scheme": "Packages/MarkdownEditing/MarkdownEditor-Dark.tmTheme",//markdown主题 "color_scheme": "Packages/Color Scheme - Default/Monokai.tmTheme",//设置主题 "font_size": 13, "line_numbers": true,//显示行号 "wrap_width": 120,//"auto" //去除左边空白 "ignored_packages": [ "Vintage" ], "enable_mathjax": true, "enable_highlight": true,}
